Last night a bunch or our seniors had their signs stolen out of their yards. The police are looking for a white pickup that was seen in Bird Island last night around 11:30 stealing a sign. There were three kids in the vehicle, at least one was a white male. Signs were stolen from both Bird Island and Olivia.

If anyone has information on this, please call law enforcement at 523-2700. If you have video systems at your home, please look to see if you see anything that might be helpful.

If the persons involved were to drop the signs off someplace, I would guess the police will stop the investigation no questions asked. If not, there will be some pretty severe consequences in store for these people.
